name: Power of Darkness Tee
description: Embrace the darkness within. This premium black tee features a glitched design inspired by the depths of anime power. Perfect for those who understand that true strength comes from accepting one's shadow.

name: Chainsaw Wisdom Hoodie
description: "Cut through the noise" - A heavy-weight hoodie featuring distressed graphics and Japanese katakana text. For those who live by the motto that sometimes you need to destroy to create.

name: Berserk Philosophy Art Print
description: High-quality art print featuring iconic Berserk imagery with philosophical quotes about struggle and perseverance. Perfect for your otaku den or meditation space.

name: Breathing Technique Meditation Mat
description: Practice your breathing techniques with this premium yoga mat inspired by Demon Slayer. Features water-breathing patterns and motivational text about mastering oneself.

name: Dedicate Your Heart Mug
description: Start your morning with the determination of the Survey Corps. This ceramic mug features the iconic 'Dedicate Your Heart' motto in both English and Japanese.

name: Cursed Energy Tank Top
description: Channel your cursed energy with this athletic tank top. Perfect for training or casual wear, featuring subtle JJK-inspired designs and motivational text about inner strength.

name: Grand Line Dream Journal
description: Document your journey to achieving your dreams with this leather-bound journal inspired by One Piece. Features navigation-themed pages and quotes about adventure and friendship.

name: Never Give Up Wall Scroll
description: A traditional wall scroll featuring Naruto's philosophy about never giving up. Hand-calligraphed Japanese text with English translation, perfect for inspiration.

name: Forest Spirit Tote Bag
description: Carry the wisdom of the forest with this eco-friendly tote bag inspired by Studio Ghibli. Features beautiful nature imagery and quotes about environmental harmony.

name: Existential Crisis Sweater
description: Embrace the philosophical depths of Evangelion with this cozy sweater. Features abstract geometric patterns and thought-provoking text about existence and identity.

name: 100% Growth Sticker Pack
description: A collection of motivational stickers inspired by Mob Psycho 100. Perfect for decorating your laptop, journal, or anywhere you need a reminder about personal growth.

name: Equivalent Exchange Enamel Pin
description: A beautifully crafted enamel pin featuring the alchemical principle of equivalent exchange. A perfect reminder that to obtain something, something of equal value must be lost.
